title: Store Admin - At Least 1 YOE (Distrist 1, Ho Chi Minh City)
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH SOCIAL BELLA VIỆT NAM
job_description:
Organize all documents at Store
Take charge of all store supplies
Work with cross-functional teams on all store programs
Maintain and update store revenues and customer records
Prepare revenue/sales and other relevant reports by/for external and internal partners weekly/monthly
Supporting the BA team with other administrative tasks, if requested
Work with internal partners for perfect display and program execution at stores
requirements:
Candidate must possess at least Vocational’s degree or higher in administration or management field.
Minimum 1 year of working experience in the related field, especially in handling stock and data of fast-moving consumer goods
Good analytical and administration skills
Detail-oriented and organized
Having experience in retail is an advantage
